original_text: And Solomon had 4,000 stalls for horses and chariots, and 12,000 horsemen, whom he stationed in the chariot cities and with the king in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 병거 메는 말의 외양간은 사천이요 마병은 만 이천 명이라 병거성에도 두고 예루살렘 왕에게도 두었으며

sentences.original_text: And Solomon had 4,000 stalls for horses and chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 말과 병거를 위한 마구간 4,000개를 두었고,

sentences.original_text: whom he stationed in the chariot cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부를 병거의 도시들에 배치하고,

sentences.original_text: and with the king in Jerusalem.
